mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match_post (match_code,home_code,away_code,match_date,status,title,content,created_at,view_count, matchType, gender, fee,member_code) VALUES (seq_match_post.NEXTVAL, #{home_code},NULL,TO_CHAR(match_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')match_date, '모집중',#{title},#{content},SYSDATE,0,#{matchType},#{gender},#{fee},#{member_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE match_post SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, match_date=#{match_date}, status=#{status}, matchType=#{matchType}, gender=#{gender},fee=#{fee} WHERE match_code=#{match_code}
mapper.select: SELECT m.match_code,ht.team_name AS home_team_name,at.team_name AS away_team_name, TO_CHAR(match_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') match_date,status,title,content,view_count, matchType,gender,fee,m.member_code, stadium_name,s.region AS region FROM match_post m JOIN team ht ON ht.team_code = m.home_code JOIN stadium s ON s.stadium_code = m.stadium_code LEFT JOIN team at ON at.team_code = m.away_code ORDER BY m.match_date

SELECT m.match_code,ht.team_name AS home_team_name,TO_CHAR(m.match_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS match_date, m.status, m.title, m.content, m.fee, s.stadium_name AS stadium_name, s.region AS region FROM match_post m JOIN team ht ON ht.team_code = m.team_code JOIN stadium s ON s.stadium.code = m.stadium.code LEFT JOIN team at ON at.team_code = m.team_code WHERE m.match_code = ${match_code}

SELECT match_code,home_code,away_code,match_date,status,title,content,view_count,matchType,gender,fee,member_code FROM match_post m JOIN team t ON t.team_code =(m.home_code || m.away_code) WHERE m.member_code = #{member_code}
